<item>
   <link>http://www.ics.uci.edu/community/news/view_news?id=1081</link>
   <title>ICS study links selfies, happiness</title>
   <pubDate>14 Sep 2016 11:00:00 PDT</pubDate>
   <description>Informatics researchers find that regularly snapping selfies with your smartphone and sharing photos with your friends can help make you a happier person.</description>
</item>

</item>


<item>
   <link>http://www.ics.uci.edu/community/news/view_news?id=1079</link>
   <title>New dean named for ICS</title>
   <pubDate>03 Aug 2016 11:00:00 PDT</pubDate>
   <description>Entrepreneur Marios Papaefthymiou, current chair of computer science & engineering at the University of Michigan, will begin his term as dean Jan. 1, 2017.</description>
